spark.jobserver.client

接口 IJobServerClient

  • 所有已知实现类:
    JobServerClient

    public interface IJobServerClient
    Java client implements Rest APIs provided by Spark Job Server.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

    • 方法详细资料

      • getJars

        java.util.List<JarInfo> getJars()
                         throws JobServerClientException
        Lists all the information of jars for potential jobs to be running in the Cluster behind the Job Server.

        This method implements the Rest API 'GET /jars' of the Job Server.

        返回:
        a list containing information of Job jars
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - error occurs when trying to get information of spark job jars

      • uploadJobJar

        boolean uploadJobJar(java.io.InputStream jarData,
                     java.lang.String appName)
              throws JobServerClientException
        Uploads a jar containing spark job to the Job Server under the given application name.

        This method implements the Rest API 'POST /jars/<appName>' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        jarData - the instance of InputStream contains the contents of the target jar file to be uploaded
        appName - the application name under which the related Job is about to run, meanwhile the application name also be the alias name of the uploaded jar file.
        返回:
        true if the operation of uploading is successful, false otherwise
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - if the given parameter jarData or appName is null, or error occurs when uploading the related spark job jar

      • uploadJobJar

        boolean uploadJobJar(java.io.File jarFile,
                     java.lang.String appName)
              throws JobServerClientException
        Uploads a jar containing spark job to the Job Server under the given application name.

        This method implements the Rest API 'POST /jars/<appName>' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        jarFile - the jar file
        appName - the application name under which the related Job is about to run, meanwhile the application name also be the alias name of the uploaded jar file.
        返回:
        true if the operation of uploading is successful, false otherwise
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - if the given parameter jarData or appName is null, or error occurs when uploading the related spark job jar

      • getContexts

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getContexts()
                                      throws JobServerClientException
        Lists all the contexts available in the Job Server.

        This method implements the Rest API 'GET /contexts ' of the Job Server.

        返回:
        a list containing names of current contexts
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - error occurs when trying to get information of contexts

      • createContext

        boolean createContext(java.lang.String contextName,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
               throws JobServerClientException
        Creates a new context in the Job Server with the given context name.

        This method implements the Rest API 'POST /contexts/<name>' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        contextName - the name of the new context to be created, it should be not null and should begin with letter.
        params - a map containing the key-value pairs appended to appoint the context settings if there is a need to configure the new created context, or null indicates the new context with the default configuration
        返回:
        true if the operation of creating is successful, false it failed to create the context because a context with the same name already exists
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - when the given contextName is null or empty string, or I/O error occurs while trying to create context in spark job server.

      • deleteContext

        boolean deleteContext(java.lang.String contextName)
               throws JobServerClientException
        Delete a context with the given name in the Job Server. All the jobs running in it will be stopped consequently.

        This method implements the Rest API 'DELETE /contexts/<name>' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        contextName - the name of the target context to be deleted, it should be not null and should begin with letter.
        返回:
        true if the operation of the deleting is successful, false otherwise
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - when the given contextName is null or empty string, or I/O error occurs while trying to delete context in spark job server.

      • getJobs

        java.util.List<JobInfo> getJobs()
                         throws JobServerClientException
        Lists the last N jobs in the Job Server.

        This method implements the Rest API 'GET /jobs' of the Job Server.

        返回:
        a list containing information of the jobs
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - error occurs when trying to get information of jobs

      • startJob

        JobInfo startJob(java.lang.String data,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
          throws JobServerClientException
        Start a new job with the given parameters.

        This method implements the Rest API 'POST /jobs' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        data - contains the the data processed by the target job.

        If it is null, it means the target spark job doesn't needs any data set in the job configuration.

        If it is not null, the format should be like a key-value pair, such as dataKey=dataValue, what the dataKey is determined by the one used in the target spark job main class which is assigned by IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CLASS_PATH.

        params - a non-null map containing parameters to start the job. the key should be the following ones: i. IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_APP_NAME, necessary one and should be one of the existing name in the calling of GET /jars. That means the appName is the alias name of the uploaded spark job jars. ii.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CLASS_PATH, necessary one iii.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CONTEXT, optional one iv.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_SYNC, optional one
        返回:
        the corresponding job status or job result
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - the given parameters exist null or empty value, or I/O error occurs when trying to start the new job

      • startJob

        JobInfo startJob(java.io.File dataFile,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
          throws JobServerClientException
        Start a new job with the given parameters.

        This method implements the Rest API 'POST /jobs' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        dataFile - contains the the data processed by the target job.

        If it is null, it means the target spark job doesn't needs any data set in the job configuration.

        If it is not null, the format should be Typesafe Config Style, such as json, properties file etc. See http://github.com/typesafehub/config what the keys in the file are determined by the one used in the target spark job main class which is assigned by IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CLASS_PATH.

        params - a non-null map containing parameters to start the job. the key should be the following ones: i. IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_APP_NAME, necessary one and should be one of the existing name in the calling of GET /jars. That means the appName is the alias name of the uploaded spark job jars. ii.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CLASS_PATH, necessary one iii.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CONTEXT, optional one iv.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_SYNC, optional one
        返回:
        the corresponding job status or job result
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - the given parameters exist null or empty value, or I/O error occurs when trying to start the new job

      • startJob

        JobInfo startJob(java.io.InputStream dataFileStream,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
          throws JobServerClientException
        Start a new job with the given parameters.

        This method implements the Rest API 'POST /jobs' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        dataFileStream - contains the the data processed by the target job.

        If it is null, it means the target spark job doesn't needs any data set in the job configuration.

        If it is not null, the format should be Typesafe Config Style, such as json, properties file etc. See http://github.com/typesafehub/config what the keys in the file are determined by the one used in the target spark job main class which is assigned by IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CLASS_PATH.

        params - a non-null map containing parameters to start the job. the key should be the following ones: i. IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_APP_NAME, necessary one and should be one of the existing name in the calling of GET /jars. That means the appName is the alias name of the uploaded spark job jars. ii.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CLASS_PATH, necessary one iii.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_CONTEXT, optional one iv.IJobServerClientConstants.PARAM_SYNC, optional one
        返回:
        the corresponding job status or job result
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - the given parameters exist null or empty value, or I/O error occurs when trying to start the new job

      • getJobResult

        JobInfo getJobResult(java.lang.String jobId)
              throws JobServerClientException
        Gets the result or status of a specific job in the Job Server.

        This method implements the Rest API 'GET /jobs/<jobId>' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        jobId - the id of the target job
        返回:
        the corresponding JobResult instance if the job with the given jobId exists, or null if there is no corresponding job or the target job has no result.
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - error occurs when trying to get information of the target job

      • getConfig

        JobConfig getConfig(java.lang.String jobId)
             throws JobServerClientException
        Gets the job configuration of a specific job.

        This method implements the Rest API 'GET /jobs/<jobId>/config' of the Job Server.

        参数:
        jobId - the id of the target job
        返回:
        the corresponding JobConfig instance if the job with the given jobId exists, or null if there is no corresponding job in the spark job server.
        抛出:
        JobServerClientException - error occurs when trying to get information of the target job configuration
